attributes.action: to change the tax rules to make affordable housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present tax system has encouraged a "buy to let culture" and this has distorted the housing market. This has removed affordable housing from the market and therefore young people have to rent rather than buy. A simple Tax rule change making buy to let less atttractive would release a large volume of properties on to the market depressing prices throughout the market and enable many people who now rent to buy.
